sen.j: 近江屋事件（おうみやじけん）は、幕末の慶応3年11月15日 (旧暦)（1867年12月10日）に坂本龍馬と中岡慎太郎が京都河原町近江屋井口新助邸において暗殺された事件のこと。
sen.e: The Omiya Incident occurred at the end of the Edo period during the last days of the Tokugawa shogunate, on December 10, 1867 (November 15 according to the old calendar) when Ryoma SAKAMOTO and Shintaro NAKAOKA were killed at the home of Shinsuke IGUCHI in Kawara-machi, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.e: On November 3, Ryoma moved out of Ikedaya, which the government had had an eye on and into Omiya.
